DOC.brief_summary: For achieve desired refinement Asian patient , sufficient septal cartilage must need ieal tip projection lengthen nose septal extension graft , columellar septal strut graft , onlay tip graft , shield graft . Actually many case insufficient septal cartilage Asian augmentation rhinoplasty . The investigator propose new technique , call 'Flag Technique ' tip-strut complex flag-like shape : use septal cartilage elongate columellar septal strut graft , shield graft , bilateral mini-spreader graft upper part elongate columellar septal strut graft without septal extension graft achieve desire result .
